name: Moviesseur
0:
”Alexa, ask Movie sir what are the reviews for Lord of the Rings”
”Alexa, ask Movie sir how is La La Land looking”
”Alexa, open Movie sir”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie sir
des:
Ask your Alexa the rating of any movie.

Moviesseur gives you the ratings of all your favorite movies. Just ask how good a movie is or how does it look to get an answer.
All data is provided by the Open Movie Database.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
